tool_description: Semantic Analysis for App Reviews - Language Understanding API (74 dedicated Semantic Models) designed, trained&tested on App Reviews.
name: Semantic Analysis for App Reviews
title: Semantic Analysis for App Reviews

api_list.name: process
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns all results in one output: general sentiment, categories, and a semantic analysis. So, you pay only once.

The input "text" is required, the input "title" is optional.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Great graphics, great app. Unfortunatelly after update I cannot login. Please fix this issue
